children: āvuso dhammasaṃgāhakā mahākassapādayo mahātheravarā paṭhamaṃ vinayaṃ saṃgāyitvā tadanantaraṃ kaṃ nāma pāvacanaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
innerText: Pucchā – paṭhamamahādhammasaṃgītikāle āvuso dhammasaṃgāhakā mahākassapādayo mahātheravarā paṭhamaṃ vinayaṃ saṃgāyitvā tadanantaraṃ kaṃ nāma pāvacanaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.

children: paṭhamamahādhammasaṃgītiyaṃ bhante dhammasaṃgāhakā mahākassapādayo mahātheravarā paṭhamaṃ vinayaṃ saṃgāyitvā tadanantaraṃ dhammaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
innerText: Vissajjanā – paṭhamamahādhammasaṃgītiyaṃ bhante dhammasaṃgāhakā mahākassapādayo mahātheravarā paṭhamaṃ vinayaṃ saṃgāyitvā tadanantaraṃ dhammaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.

children: nāma āvuso suttantābhidhammavasena duvidho, tattha kataraṃ dhammaṃ paṭhamaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
innerText: Pucchā – dhammo nāma āvuso suttantābhidhammavasena duvidho, tattha kataraṃ dhammaṃ paṭhamaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.

children: dvīsu bhante dhammesu suttantābhidhammapiṭakesu paṭhamaṃ suttantaṃ piṭakaṃ dhammaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
innerText: Vissajjanā – dvīsu bhante dhammesu suttantābhidhammapiṭakesu paṭhamaṃ suttantaṃ piṭakaṃ dhammaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.

children: pi āvuso dīghamajjhimasaṃyuttaaṅguttarakhuddakanikāyavasena pañca nikāyā, tesu paṭhamaṃ kataraṃ nikāyaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
innerText: Pucchā – suttantapiṭake pi āvuso dīghamajjhimasaṃyuttaaṅguttarakhuddakanikāyavasena pañca nikāyā, tesu paṭhamaṃ kataraṃ nikāyaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.

children: pañcasu bhante nikāyesu paṭhamaṃ dīghanikāyaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
innerText: Vissajjanā – pañcasu bhante nikāyesu paṭhamaṃ dīghanikāyaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.

children: dīghanikāyepi āvuso tayo vaggā catuttiṃsā ca suttāni, tesu kataraṃ vaggaṃ katarañca suttaṃ paṭhamaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
innerText: Pucchā – dīghanikāyepi āvuso tayo vaggā catuttiṃsā ca suttāni, tesu kataraṃ vaggaṃ katarañca suttaṃ paṭhamaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.

children: dīghanikāyepi bhante tīsu vaggesu paṭhamaṃ sīlakkhandhavaggaṃ, catuttiṃsatiyā ca suttesu paṭhamaṃ brahmajālasuttaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
innerText: Vissajjanā – dīghanikāyepi bhante tīsu vaggesu paṭhamaṃ sīlakkhandhavaggaṃ, catuttiṃsatiyā ca suttesu paṭhamaṃ brahmajālasuttaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
